channel.title: Making my self admin problem
channel.description: i cant make my self a admin when i go to charartecrs and change my rights to 2 and save compile run im not a admin i tried changing my rights to 3 still nothing

item.title: Making my self admin problem
item.dc:creator: @Master_Guru Master Guru
item.description:
@Master_Guru wrote:

Did it work? If it didn’t First Logout of Your Account. Then, go to “Characters” file find your account name. Now when you opened the Notepad for your account you should see “PlayerRights = 0” or something like that. Now you can change the number to any number between 0-4.

               0 = Normal Player ( No Crown)
               1 = Moderator (Grey Crown}
               2 = Administrator ( Gold Crown)
               3 = Owner (Gold Crown)
               4 = Hidden Administrator ( Hidden Crown) You an do any command including ::Pickup, ::ban, Etc..

Read full topic

item.title: Making my self admin problem
item.dc:creator: @bigballers bigballers
item.description:
@bigballers wrote:

dude u could always try…
Going into the folder called “data”
or going into ur character file

                          Data.

Ok going into the folder called data you should see some txt documents called “administrators” or “moderators” or… “staff”

                          Going into your character file

Ok well going into your character file means go into the folder called “characters” and then search for your account then double click it, and finally change the character rights = 0 to character rights = 3

                          If you do not have Character file

Add one… if you dont have one.
You can add one by right clicking your server file and clicking new then click New folder name it Characters

Glad i could help

Read full topic
